events.message: We received the candidate's application for the software engineer position early this morning and started processing it.
The application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster since the candidate applied for a developer role.
A recruiter specialized in technical roles was assigned to this candidate to proceed with the screening process efficiently.
The initial screening has been completed where the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge of software development practices.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm about the opportunity to join our engineering team.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate with the senior engineering panel for next week.
